Dialogue.Page: Mod: Lonesome Lake Authors: Asymmetrical Cavern
Lonesome Lake is a mod made for the fourth mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community. The mod is very short, yet impactful.
While I can't say much about the mod without spoiling it entirely, it takes place on a vessel constructed by a group of Inhabitants.
While it didn't win any awards, it is an experience worth trying!
